-- | monad-peel instances for Happstack types
--   
--   monad-peel instances for Happstack types
@package happstack-monad-peel
@version 0.1


-- | This module defines instances of <a>MonadTransPeel</a> and
--   <a>MonadPeelIO</a> for Happstacks data types <a>ServerPartT</a>,
--   <a>FilterT</a> and <a>WebT</a>.
--   
--   To use these instances, add
--   
--   <pre>
--   import Happstack.Server.MonadPeel ()
--   </pre>
--   
--   to the import list of your Haskell module.
module Happstack.Server.MonadPeel
instance MonadPeelIO m => MonadPeelIO (ServerPartT m)
instance MonadPeelIO m => MonadPeelIO (WebT m)
instance MonadPeelIO m => MonadPeelIO (FilterT (FilterFun a) m)
instance MonadTransPeel ServerPartT
instance MonadTransPeel WebT
instance MonadTransPeel (FilterT (FilterFun a))
